overview:
Ken Littleton is a serial entrepreneur, visual effects magician and world traveler.

He co-founded Solumena, LLC in 2011 with his wife and partner, Kelly Littleton, to expand their passion for cruising to create hospitality innovation for the cruise industry.

He has also been involved with the creation of visual effects for Oscar-winning films such as ‘Titanic’, ‘What Dreams May Come’ and ‘Independence Day’.

He has also been involved with various technology start-ups in the motivational speaking and publishing industry, the financial sector, and the film and broadcast industry.
